comments: Inspect an access token issued as the result of the User based grant such as the Authorization Code Grant, Implicit Grant, the User Credentials Grant or the Refresh Grant.

params.name: client_id
comments: The unique client identifier. The client Id is the Id of the FusionAuth Application for which this token was generated.

params.name: token
comments: The access token returned by this OAuth provider as the result of a successful client credentials grant.

params.name: tenantId
comments: (Optional) The Id of the tenant to use for this request.
